name: Extend
headline: Document processing reimagined with LLMs
description: We’re helping companies transform their documents into high quality data, achieve unmatched accuracy, and ship custom document automation in days, not months.

founders.name: Kushal Byatnal, Founder
founders.description: 2x technical founder interested in making it easy to build internal tools. Previously, I worked as an early engineer at Brex and then cofounded Stir, a creator fintech company that grew to hundreds of millions in payment volume.

# Document processing reimagined with LLMs
### Document processing reimagined with LLMs
#### Document processing reimagined with LLMs
Turn your documents into high quality data, achieve unmatched accuracy, and ship custom document automation in days, not months.
Turn your documents into high quality data, achieve unmatched accuracy, and ship custom document automation in days, not months.
Turn your documents into high quality data, achieve unmatched accuracy, and ship custom document automation in days, not months.
Get Started
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/k8anPVuFo6dJk3v2c1W0DQR18Y.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/k8anPVuFo6dJk3v2c1W0DQR18Y.png)
Cutting-edge companies ship document processing with Extend
Cutting-edge companies ship document processing with Extend
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/8qUboaN4WVvSx2nBqN7QYuMfmpc.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/igqWekHwPgtAF5UJmoCiAdog.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/4gep2Iex9SLtb7wDdRK9FwLCVAE.png)
### Accelerate your team with the best document infrastructure
#### Accelerate your team with the best document infrastructure
##### Accelerate your team with the best document infrastructure
Extend enables technical teams to handle complex documents with state-of-the-art accuracy and reliability.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/2v6GLCKZTdgXmf5fdgur40L8HY.svg)
##### Without Extend
Lower quality results, significant implementation times, and continued R&D investment
Lower quality results, significant implementation times, and continued R&D investment
Accuracy
Accuracy
#### ~80%
##### ~80%
Live in
Live in
#### Months?
##### Months?
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/bfrMoIJfXW7wu8qJ7uJ2wm4XRlc.svg)
##### With Extend
Rapidly achieve accuracy and free up your team to innovate, not maintain infra
Rapidly achieve accuracy and free up your team to innovate, not maintain infra
Rapidly achieve accuracy and free up your team to innovate, not maintain infrastructure
Accuracy
Accuracy
#### > 95 %
##### > 95 %
Live in
Live in
#### Days
##### Days
### The new standard in document intelligence.
#### The new standard in document intelligence.
##### The new standard in document intelligence.
Traditional OCR wasn't built for today's challenges. We rebuilt document AI from the ground up with LLMs to handle your most complex use cases with unrivaled performance.
Traditional OCR wasn't built for today's challenges. We rebuilt document AI from the ground up with LLMs to handle your most complex use cases with unrivaled performance.
##### Next-gen document understanding
Next-gen document understanding
Extend's models are engineered specifically for complex documents, including tables, signatures, handwriting, images, and more. Process any document type with exceptional accuracy, from structured PDFs to degraded scans.
Extend's models are engineered specifically for complex documents, including tables, signatures, handwriting, images, and more. Process any document type with exceptional accuracy, from structured PDFs to degraded scans.
![Next-gen document understanding](https://framerusercontent.com/images/7UduQd4a91Ekt94TzPal3R5Do.svg)
![Next-gen document understanding](https://framerusercontent.com/images/7UduQd4a91Ekt94TzPal3R5Do.svg)
![Next-gen document understanding](https://framerusercontent.com/images/7UduQd4a91Ekt94TzPal3R5Do.svg)
![Next-gen document understanding](https://framerusercontent.com/images/7UduQd4a91Ekt94TzPal3R5Do.svg)
##### Rapid path to high accuracy
Rapid path to high accuracy
Skip months of trial and error. Use Extend’s battle tested Extraction, Classification, and Splitting processors to reach > 95% accuracy quickly.
Skip months of trial and error. Use Extend’s battle tested Extraction, Classification, and Splitting processors to reach > 95% accuracy quickly.
![Rapid path to high accuracy](https://framerusercontent.com/images/KddMFNzUkHQbFCCjfeL7ZaEJnA.png)
![Rapid path to high accuracy](https://framerusercontent.com/images/KddMFNzUkHQbFCCjfeL7ZaEJnA.png)
![Rapid path to high accuracy](https://framerusercontent.com/images/KddMFNzUkHQbFCCjfeL7ZaEJnA.png)
![Rapid path to high accuracy](https://framerusercontent.com/images/KddMFNzUkHQbFCCjfeL7ZaEJnA.png)
##### Empower your domain experts
Empower your domain experts
Enable technical & non-technical members to quickly iterate, review results, and improve accuracy with Extend's built-in tooling.
Enable technical & non-technical members to quickly iterate, review results, and improve accuracy with Extend's built-in tooling.
![Empower your domain experts](https://framerusercontent.com/images/J5028iwE6vd5xufLannc5n5NQXQ.svg)
![Empower your domain experts](https://framerusercontent.com/images/J5028iwE6vd5xufLannc5n5NQXQ.svg)
![Empower your domain experts](https://framerusercontent.com/images/J5028iwE6vd5xufLannc5n5NQXQ.svg)
![Empower your domain experts](https://framerusercontent.com/images/J5028iwE6vd5xufLannc5n5NQXQ.svg)
##### Custom fine-tuning pipelines
Custom fine-tuning pipelines
Turn every review into a teaching moment. Extend turns corrections into custom fine-tuned models, specifically optimized for your documents.
Turn every review into a teaching moment. Extend turns corrections into custom fine-tuned models, specifically optimized for your documents.
![Custom fine-tuning pipelines](https://framerusercontent.com/images/ZQBHEQKV8T1wcn1zBViDiat9E.svg)
##### Build trust with evals
Build trust with evals
Built-in evaluation tools help you benchmark and analyze performance, giving you the confidence to go live.
Built-in evaluation tools help you benchmark and analyze performance, giving you the confidence to go live.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/TMEzB2rHaMII0YIjEE2pSBSc0.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/TMEzB2rHaMII0YIjEE2pSBSc0.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/mNmzKEWbhLmlr4ZTXjzhgObMpCo.png)
### Don't just take our word for it
#### Don't just take our word for it
"Extend accelerated our timelines and enabled us to go live in just a few weeks. Building something equivalent in-house would have taken us ~6 months."
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/YA7elq20qfQ7vWIUt1zu7yBs80.jpeg)
Jaime Blasco
Co-Founder & CTO at Nudge Security
"We did a bakeoff, and Extend had the best results of any solution on the market. It eliminates an entire class of engineering problems around accuracy that we don't want to worry about."
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/uPCUV9XOa0WrgUVAMhzzuNesxyQ.jpeg)
Matt Hodgson
CTO at Vendr
"I don't know what you guys are doing under the hood, but it's so much more accurate than any other tool we've tried."
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/qYErAE1oQWne5TiaiOcqimmO8.jpeg)
Fabio Fleitas
Co-Founder & CTO at Tesorio
"Extend eliminates the ongoing maintenance cost of model tuning, scoring, evaluations, and more. We're able to focus on innovating on our core experience, instead of managing the infra."
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/4uz0lmcFTGf28VoUOcw7AOgqgj8.jpeg)

### Document infrastructure for every use case
#### Document infrastructure for every use case
#### Document infrastructure for every use case
From prototype to production, build any document experience you can imagine on a foundation that’s always at the cutting edge.
##### 01
##### Ingestion pipelines
FILE PARSING
Ingest and transform documents into high quality markdown for LLMs. Our multimodal models break down complex layouts with exceptional accuracy, semantically chunk elements, and deliver clean LLM-ready outputs.
Ingest and transform documents into high quality markdown for LLMs. Our multimodal models break down complex layouts with exceptional accuracy, semantically chunk elements, and deliver clean LLM-ready outputs.
##### 02
##### In-product experiences
EXTRACTION
CLASSIFICATION
SPLITTING
Embed user-facing document flows into your product with customizable, low-latency extraction and classification. Use our APIs to turn complex docs into structured data in seconds, within a polished experience native to your product.
##### 03
##### Back-office automation
WORKFLOWS
HITL REVIEW
DATA VALIDATION
Deploy document automation for your most critical workflows by combining high accuracy with human oversight. Built-in confidence scoring, data validations, and powerful review tools ensure quality at scale.
TRUSTED BY STARTUPS AND FORTUNE 500s
### Powering modern companies in all industries
#### Powering modern companies in all industries

Turn your documents into high quality data, achieve unmatched accuracy, and ship custom document automation in days, not months.

### The new standard in document intelligence.
#### The new standard in document intelligence.
##### The new standard in document intelligence.
Traditional OCR wasn't built for today's challenges. We rebuilt document AI from the ground up with LLMs to handle your most complex use cases with unrivaled performance.
Traditional OCR wasn't built for today's challenges. We rebuilt document AI from the ground up with LLMs to handle your most complex use cases with unrivaled performance.
##### Next-gen document understanding
Next-gen document understanding
Extend's models are engineered specifically for complex documents, including tables, signatures, handwriting, images, and more. Process any document type with exceptional accuracy, from structured PDFs to degraded scans.
Extend's models are engineered specifically for complex documents, including tables, signatures, handwriting, images, and more. Process any document type with exceptional accuracy, from structured PDFs to degraded scans.

##### Rapid path to high accuracy
Rapid path to high accuracy
Skip months of trial and error. Use Extend’s battle tested Extraction, Classification, and Splitting processors to reach > 95% accuracy quickly.
Skip months of trial and error. Use Extend’s battle tested Extraction, Classification, and Splitting processors to reach > 95% accuracy quickly.

##### Empower your domain experts
Empower your domain experts
Enable technical & non-technical members to quickly iterate, review results, and improve accuracy with Extend's built-in tooling.
Enable technical & non-technical members to quickly iterate, review results, and improve accuracy with Extend's built-in tooling.

##### Custom fine-tuning pipelines
Custom fine-tuning pipelines
Turn every review into a teaching moment. Extend turns corrections into custom fine-tuned models, specifically optimized for your documents.
Turn every review into a teaching moment. Extend turns corrections into custom fine-tuned models, specifically optimized for your documents.

### Document infrastructure for every use case
#### Document infrastructure for every use case
#### Document infrastructure for every use case
From prototype to production, build any document experience you can imagine on a foundation that’s always at the cutting edge.
##### 01
##### Ingestion pipelines
FILE PARSING
Ingest and transform documents into high quality markdown for LLMs. Our multimodal models break down complex layouts with exceptional accuracy, semantically chunk elements, and deliver clean LLM-ready outputs.
Ingest and transform documents into high quality markdown for LLMs. Our multimodal models break down complex layouts with exceptional accuracy, semantically chunk elements, and deliver clean LLM-ready outputs.
##### 02
##### In-product experiences
EXTRACTION
CLASSIFICATION
SPLITTING
Embed user-facing document flows into your product with customizable, low-latency extraction and classification. Use our APIs to turn complex docs into structured data in seconds, within a polished experience native to your product.
##### 03
##### Back-office automation
WORKFLOWS
HITL REVIEW
DATA VALIDATION
Deploy document automation for your most critical workflows by combining high accuracy with human oversight. Built-in confidence scoring, data validations, and powerful review tools ensure quality at scale.
TRUSTED BY STARTUPS AND FORTUNE 500s

generated_description:
**Company Summary: Extend**

**Overview:**
Extend is a cutting-edge startup, founded in 2023 and based in New York. As a proud member of Y Combinator's Winter 2023 batch, Extend is on a mission to redefine document processing through the use of large language models (LLMs). The company was born out of a vision: to transform documents into high-quality data, achieve unmatched accuracy, and enable rapid document automation deployment in days rather than months.

**Mission:**
"Document processing reimagined with LLMs" encapsulates Extend's goal to not just improve existing processes, but fundamentally rethink how we interact with and extract value from our documents. They recognize that traditional OCR systems fell short, especially in handling complex document layouts, and have created a solution built for today's challenges.

**Key Features:**
- **High Accuracy:** Extend claims to achieve over 95% accuracy in document processing, significantly improving on the typical 80% accuracy seen with traditional methods.
- **Quick Deployment:** Their solution allows teams to go live in mere days, not months—freeing them to innovate instead of spending time on infrastructure.
- **Comprehensive document management:** Their platform supports a range of document complexities, including tables, handwriting, and more, ensuring exceptional performance across various document types.

**Team & Leadership:**
Currently, Extend has a lean team of 6 employees, led by notable Group Partner Dalton Caldwell. Their small size belies an impressive ambition—they are set to tackle complex problems that many larger organizations struggle with.

**Industry Impact:**
Extend positions itself at the intersection of AI and business operations (B2B), supplying essential tools for various industries, including financial services, real estate, supply chain, logistics, and healthcare. By providing a robust document infrastructure, Extend helps modern businesses streamline operations and unlock new efficiencies.

**Why It Matters:**
In a world where data is crucial for decision-making, Extend represents a pivotal shift toward better data utilization and operational efficiency. By using advanced AI-driven insights, they solve engineering problems and reduce resource drain in managing document infrastructures.

If you're interested in more details, you can visit their official site [here](https://www.extend.app/). With a commitment to innovative solutions and an impressive start, Extend is a company to watch as it pushes the boundaries of what's possible in document processing.
